characters.name: Naofumi Iwatani
characters.description:
A university student that was summoned to another world as the Shield Hero. Typically unsociable, he's friendly and easy-going to those close to him.

~!After being abandoned by [Malty](https://anilist.co/character/129808) and being treated as a criminal by the people of the world, He unlocked the curse series. The sin he has unlocked is Wrath (against the people of the world).!~

characters.name: Raphtalia
characters.description:
**Race:** Raccoon & Tanuki

Raphtalia is a Tanuki-type Demi-Human who was the first real member of the Shield Hero's party after he purchased her as a slave.

~!Raphtalia later obtain one of the eight vassal weapons from another world granting her the title of Vassal Weapon Wielder and Katana Hero. Due to the passive effects of the Vassal Weapons her slave curse seal was removed.!~

characters.name: Filo
characters.description:
**Age:** <1 (mentally), 10 (physically)
**Race:** Filolial

Filo was originally hatched from a monster egg which Naofumi purchased from the slave trader.

Filo grew at an abnormally fast rate and in just a few days grown into a fully grown Filolial later developing into a rare species of Filolial Queen where she was later given the ability to transform into a humanoid form strongly resembling a Angel and the ability to talk due to her association with the Shield Hero and the effects of the Legendary Shield.

characters.name: Malty Melromarc
alt_names: マルティ・メルロマルク
characters.description: The first princess of Melromarc who betrayed [Naofumi Iwatani](https://anilist.co/character/88817) in the beginning of the series. She is notorious for manipulating other people in order to satisfy her selfish desires.

characters.name: Motoyasu Kitamura
characters.description:
A university student summoned to another world as the Spear Hero. He is an easy-going and handsome womanizer.

~!After being abandoned by [Malty](https://anilist.co/character/129808), He has developed an obsession for Filolials. After Fio tried to cheer him up, he can now only see women as pigs in the literal sense. He raised three Filolials, called Kuu, Marin and Midori because he couldn't get Fios attention. He also unlocks the curse series. His sins are Lust (for Fio) and Envy (for Naofumis position of being loved by Fio).!~

characters.name: Ren Amaki
characters.description:
A high school student who was summoned to another world as the Sword Hero. He's considered a bishounen and tends to stay quiet.

~!After his companions die, he fell into despair, and, thus, he followed [Malty](https://anilist.co/character/129808) when she offered kind words to him. After being abandoned by her, he had a brief stint as a bandit, after which he came under the Female Knight's tutelage. He also unlocked the curse series after being abandoned by Malty. His sins are Greed (For Power) and Gluttony (For Power).!~

characters.name: Melty Q Melromarc
alt_names: メルティ・Q・メルロマルク
characters.description:
The second princess of Melromarc.

Melty is in many ways the exact opposite of her sister, Malty. This includes their personality, appearance, magic specialty (water vs fire), and color schemes (blue and white against red and brown).

characters.name: Itsuki Kawasumi
characters.description:
A high school student summoned to another world as the Bow Hero. He is usually calm and well-mannered. However, He has a messiah complex, and is pretty much a justice maniac. He vanquishes evildoers without thinking of the consequences of his actions. However, this is just because he is immature. He doesn't actually have any bad intentions.

~!When the Spirit Turtle revived, Itsuki and the party was forced to challenge it, but the party ran away, leaving him as a sacrifice to the Turtle.!~

characters.name: Beloukas
characters.description: The slave dealer that sells Naofumi Iwatani many slaves. He also conducts slave and monster seal rituals. Despite his appearance and his trade, he is an honest salesman. Upon Naofumi’s request, he searches for and collects slaves who were former villagers of Raphtalia’s village

characters.name: Aultcray Melromarc XXXII
alt_names: オルトクレイ＝メルロマルク３２世
characters.description:
The king of Melromarc. He shows obvious favoritism towards his daughter [Malty](https://anilist.co/character/129808) and animosity towards the Shield Hero [Naofumi Iwatani](https://anilist.co/character/88817).
~!
It was revealed that Aultcray is the Wand Hero who led his country in a war against demi-humans and beastmen. Through that experience, he holds hatred towards non-human species and promotes the idea of human supremacy in Melromarc. He shows biased hatred towards Naofumi because the Shield Hero is revered as the protector of demi-humans and beastmen.

When Queen Mirelia Q Melromarc comes back to Melromarc after resolving diplomatic issues, she strips Aultcray of his authorities due to his ineptitude to properly lead the people and officially changed his name to Trash as punishment for his abuse of power.!~

~!The king's real name was Luge Lances Forbrey and used the alias Luge Lancarose to hide the fact that he was of royal blood when he battled in the front lines during the war. The name Aultcray Melromarc XXXII was adopted when he married Mirelia and became king.

He was the third legitimate heir to the throne of Forbrey, but lost that privilege when the Hakuko race killed his parents and loved ones. Due to that fact that Forbrey did nothing to retaliate against the Hakuko residing in Siltvelt due to political reasons, Luge began to despise both countries and moved to the human supremacy-promoting country of Melromarc. He later challenged and defeated the Hakuko king.!~

characters.name: Erhard
characters.description: Erhard is a blacksmith and a weapon shop owner in the castle town of Melromarc. His shop is the only shop in Melromarc to sell shields while others don't for religious reasons.

characters.name: Yakkyoku no Owner
characters.description: The old man that runs the medicinal shop has a relatives that live in Riyuuto Village. Because Naofumi saved many people during the second wave, the old man happily assist Naofumi whenever he's needed.

characters.name: Biscas  T. Balmus
alt_names: ビスカス . T . バルマス
characters.description:
The highest priest of the Three Heroes Cult. 
~!He used his deep connections in the nation to do away with any opposing authority in the kingdom. He was so narrow-minded that he calls all of his actions "the will of God". He also claims that his followers who died in the fight against the Shield Hero will go to Heaven as a holy reward.

When wielding the replica of the Legendary Weapons, Biscas shows a visible "God complex," as he proclaimed himself God while labeling evil anyone who opposed him. he masterminded many events and tried to kill all of the heroes. He killed the queen's right-hand man who happens to be Eclair's father so that the authority rest with King Aultcray Melromarc XXXII, who was at the time was very gullible and easy to manipulate.!~

characters.name: Mirellia Q Melromarc
characters.description: The queen of Melromarc. She holds the true power of the crown and is generally a just ruler. She is known for her diplomacy and negotiation skills.

characters.name: Yousaiya
characters.description:
She is the owner of the tailor store. Her name was never mentioned so she is referred to as the Tailor.

She made her debut in both the light novel and anime​ but never made her debut in the manga. She was only mentioned by the Magic Shop Owner as being a friend of hers.
